description: Try our easy to follow Black Pepper & Mustard Beef Roast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Black Pepper & Mustard Beef Roast Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 broccoli heads, cut into large florets
1 tbs dijon mustard (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180oC (160oC fan forced). Combine the oil and mustard and brush over the beef, then season generously with salt and pepper. Place a large frying pan over a medium-high heat and cook the beef for 6-8 minutes, turning often, until well browned all over.
Place the beef in a roasting tray lined with baking paper and roast for 30 minutes for medium-rare, or until cooked to your liking. Rest, lightly covered with foil, for 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, for the broccoli, bring a saucepan half-filled with water to the boil over medium-high heat. Place a steamer basket on top of the saucepan then add the broccoli and cook for 4-5 minutes, covered, or until tender.
Cook the potato mash according to packet instructions.
Slice the beef and serve with steamed broccoli, extra mustard, mashed potato and gravy.
